alert.note: Alert for Portage; Waupaca; Waushara; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 1:02AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Wood, southern Portage, Waushara and southern Waupaca Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 102 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Amherst to 6 miles west of Plainfield to Adams. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stevens Point, Waupaca, Wautoma, Redgranite, Whiting, Amherst, Plainfield, Fremont, Napowan Scout Camp and Hartman Creek State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
